title: === LF decent bronze players for ranked play ===
body:
Hi all,

As title reads, looking for decent bronze players for ranked. With the current meta riot is forcing us to make premades in order to fight off other premades in ranked. I'm currently in B3 and main adc with mid as secondary. Looking to climb up so add me in game and we can discuss further thanks.

replies.body: Um yeah I need to get out of bronze fast 2 if you can help get me out of bronze by thursday I will be forever in your debt
Triggered... go play in traffic little one ;)
